Name: Mushroom Witch
Text: G'morning cuz! Felt like checking in on--

Name: Mushroom Witch
Text: Great Galloping Ghosts! You ok? You look like a zombie... even more so than usual! Have you been taking care of yourself? How much sleep have you gotten recently?

Name: Mushroom Witch
Text: Anyways, say, uh, do you have any sleep powder you can lend me? Need some for a little experiment I'm doing.
